description:
Step up your packing game. Wrinkles, rumples and creases be damned when you have lightweight packing cubes. Each cube has 2 compartments, one with a transparent panel and one with a venting mesh panel so you can separate dirty clothes from clean, darks from lights, or active from casual. The Mesh Cube is part of MEC’s Travel Light series, a collection of packs and accessories for people on the move between urban, wilderness, recreational and work settings. Redesigned for 2018 to save 100,000 pieces of packaging.

  • Made of nylon with a water-resistant polyurethane coating
  • Separate top and bottom compartments with large zippered clamshell lids
  • Airy mesh panel on one compartment lets your gear breathe
  • Webbing handle for carrying or hanging
  • Small internal slip pocket doubles as stuff pocket to store the cube when you're not using it
name: MEC Travel Light Dual-Zip Mesh Cube
